column5: This condo has all the bells and whistles! This completely remodeled condo is in the best possible location in the heart of New Braunfels, and on the beautiful Comal River. The complex has a pool, hot tub, direct river access and is located within walking distance of the Schlitterbahn Water Park, historic downtown, restaurants and nightlife.
column8: Beautiful Condo on the Comal River - Sure to Please! - Inverness 102
